import { withRouter } from 'next/router'; import Layout from '../components/Layout.js'; import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faCity, faClock, faFlag, faGlobeEurope, faLocationArrow, faMapMarkedAlt, faPhone, faPhoneSquareAlt, faRulerCombined, faStreetView, faUsers } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const titleStyle = { textAlign: 'left', float: 'left' }; const valueStyle = { textAlign: 'left', float: 'left' }; const SelectedCountry = withRouter(props => (

{parseFloat(props.router.query.lat).toFixed(3)}° & {parseFloat(props.router.query.lon).toFixed(3)}°
Area:
{props.router.query.area}km²
Population:
{(props.router.query.population / 1000000).toFixed(3)} Million People
Timezone:
{props.router.query.timezone} ({props.router.query.capital})
Demonym:
{props.router.query.demonym}
Calling Code:
+{props.router.query.callingCode}
Country Code:
{props.router.query.alpha2Code}
